attributes.action: Post Office for Victoria Street St. Albans
attributes.additional_details:
Resident off all the areas surrounding the St. Albans City Station want a Post Office Branch on Victoria Street to fill in for the previous Post Office on Beaconsfield Road.

Residents want the government to make the Post Office aware that there is a need for a branch on this location for the benefit of the local residents and the local business in the area.
